about_the_game:
Get ready for the human revolution (or to squash it) with this set of Cyberpunk-themed icons for your UI needs. PVGames is adding to their CyberCity series with a massive pack of 512x512 pixel images to use in cutscenes and inventory menus. Over 800 icons offer up images for vials and weapons, clothing, equipment, furniture, consumables, containers, and much more!

Icons inside this set include:

* Weapons
* Armor and clothing
* Food and consumables
* Everyday objects
* Tech pieces and machinery
* Cyberware
* Ads and signs
* Vending machines and arcade cabinets
* Ammo
* Bottles and beakers
* Furniture, decorative items, and clutter
* Computers and terminals
* Android pieces
* Tools
* Medical supplies
* And much more!

All icons are oversized at 512x512.

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
